summary: The package provides a unified, type‑safe abstraction layer for interacting with a wide range of large language‑model providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Cohere, Gemini, Mistral, Vertex AI, etc.). It includes synchronous and asynchronous client wrappers, request templating, hook mechanisms, retry and re‑ask logic, function/tool schema conversion, multimodal content handling, and utilities that parse raw model responses into Pydantic models with validation and token‑usage tracking.
business_intent: To streamline and standardize LLM integration for developers, delivering structured, validated outputs with minimal boilerplate while supporting multiple providers, retries, multimodal data, and extensible processing pipelines.
